device.description: Specifies the name of the device.

whoAmI.description: Specifies the unique identifier for this device type.

firmwareVersion.description: Specifies the semantic version of the device firmware.

hardwareVersion.description: Specifies the semantic version of the device hardware.

registers.description: Specifies the collection of registers implementing the device function.

name.description: Specifies the unique name of the register.

description.description: Specifies a summary description of the register function.

address.description: Specifies the unique 8-bit address of the register.

registerType.description: Specifies the expected use of the register.

payloadType.description: Specifies the type of the register payload.

arrayType.description: Specifies the optional array format for the register payload.

maskType.description: Specifies which mask type should be used when reading or writing the register payload.

converter.description: Specifies an optional converter method used to parse the register payload.

alias.description: Specifies an optional alias used to generate the register high-level interface.

visibility.description: Specifies whether the register function is exposed in the high-level interface.

group.description: Specifies an optional group name used to expose the register function in the high-level interface.
